mapper.select: SELECT idx ,title ,name ,count ,DATE_FORMAT(regdate,"%Y-%m-%d") AS regdate ,CASE WHEN category = "C" THEN "bbs" WHEN category = "D" THEN "devOps" END AS notice ,CONCAT("/",idx) AS url FROM bbs WHERE useyn = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT a.idx ,a.title ,CONVERT(a.contents USING utf8) AS contents ,a.name ,a.id ,b.uuid_file_name ,b.real_file_name ,b.file_path FROM bbs a LEFT JOIN bbs_file b ON a.idx = b.idx WHERE a.idx = #{idx}

select count(*) as listCnt from bbs where useyn = 'Y' and category = #{category}
and title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and contents like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into bbs (title, contents, name, regdate, useyn, category, id) values (#{title}, #{contents}, #{name}, NOW(), 'Y', #{category}, #{id})
insert into bbs_file (idx, uuid_file_name, real_file_name, file_path, file_size, writer, regdate) values (#{idx}, #{uuid_file_name}, #{real_file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_size}, #{id}, NOW())
mapper.update: update bbs set useyn = 'N' where idx = #{idx}
